```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidytext)
library(textdata)
library(vcd)
```

```{r}
df <- read_csv("./resources/data_combined_filtered_sentiment.csv")
```

```{r}
colnames(df)
```
```{r}
head(df)
```


```{r}
df <- df %>% filter(group != "newsmedia") %>%  mutate(type = case_when(
         sentiment_score > 0.01  ~ "positive",
         sentiment_score < -0.01 ~ "negative",
         TRUE ~ "neutral"))

mosaic(type ~ group, direction = c("v", "h"), main = "Sentiment Results for Different Groups", df)
```
